about_the_game:
Nature’s greatest beasts roam once more, and you thought they were extinct...



Survive on a mystery island. Learn and adapt. The world is full of natural dangers. From environmental threats such as harsh terrain, bad weather, and poisonous flora, to the most dangerous fauna.

Gather raw materials, forage, craft and improve tools needed to survive in a hostile environment.
Discover shallow caves, ruins, and high trees as you scramble for safety.
Monitor your health and heal your wounds, a simple scratch can lead to your failure.


Craft tools and weapons perfect for hunting. Stalk your prey and wait for the right moment to strike. Animals will act differently, requiring a certain approach from you. Set traps, catch fish, and use the environment around you to become an active player in the food chain.

Whether it’s in the light of day or the cover of darkness, the art of hunting is there to be mastered.


You are not at the top of the food chain.
The island holds a mystery, and the greatest reptiles roam once again. Hide your scent by covering your body with mud, use stealth mechanics and try outsmarting the real threat.

Dinosaurs are dangerous, they feed and fight for territory. They will react not only to your actions but also to the surroundings and other animals. Raptors will learn, call each other, organize an attack and set traps. Predators will decide if you are a worthy prey.
detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR GAME!


About the Game

Nature’s greatest beasts roam once more, and you thought they were extinct...



Survive on a mystery island. Learn and adapt. The world is full of natural dangers. From environmental threats such as harsh terrain, bad weather, and poisonous flora, to the most dangerous fauna.

Gather raw materials, forage, craft and improve tools needed to survive in a hostile environment.
Discover shallow caves, ruins, and high trees as you scramble for safety.
Monitor your health and heal your wounds, a simple scratch can lead to your failure.


Craft tools and weapons perfect for hunting. Stalk your prey and wait for the right moment to strike. Animals will act differently, requiring a certain approach from you. Set traps, catch fish, and use the environment around you to become an active player in the food chain.

Whether it’s in the light of day or the cover of darkness, the art of hunting is there to be mastered.


You are not at the top of the food chain.
The island holds a mystery, and the greatest reptiles roam once again. Hide your scent by covering your body with mud, use stealth mechanics and try outsmarting the real threat.

Dinosaurs are dangerous, they feed and fight for territory. They will react not only to your actions but also to the surroundings and other animals. Raptors will learn, call each other, organize an attack and set traps. Predators will decide if you are a worthy prey.

name: GONER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Goner is a thrilling new take on open-world survival games. Adapt, learn and overcome. You can’t fight the environment. You are not at the top of the food chain. YOU ARE ISOLATED.
